alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Greenwood; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Laurens, northeastern Abbeville and northern Greenwood Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Laurens, or 6 miles north of Ware Shoals, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ware Shoals, Princeton and Hickory Tavern. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
